en-US.summary: Talk to Sam, your AI assistant
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask hey sam what time is it
Alexa, ask hey sam to tell me a joke
en-US.name: Sam
en-US.description: Sam is a voice-first AI assistant that can answer questions, have conversations, check the weather, set timers, and much more.
